TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Zihing, title = Zihing, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zihing} }

S.FORM: == Zihing == u sulit nu Hulam: 義興部落 i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Zihing. u kasalumaluma' nu Zihing sa, 76 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 256 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 242 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 1%. Zihing u sulit nu Hulam: 爺亨部落 i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Zihing. u kasalumaluma' nu Zihing sa, 79 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 246 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 230 ku tademaw, pakalatu 93%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 16 ku tademaw, pakalatu 7%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 90%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 2%.

== Zihing == o solit no Holam: 義興部落 i Taoyoan a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Zihing. o kasalomaloma' no Zihing sa, 76 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 256 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 242 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 14 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 1%. Zihing o solit no Holam: 爺亨部落 i Taoyoan a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Zihing. o kasalomaloma' no Zihing sa, 79 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 246 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 230 ko tademaw, pakalato 93%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 16 ko tademaw, pakalato 7%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 90%, Bonon 1%, zomazoma 2%.
